Text:
Sir Merzedes,
Thanks a lot for all clips you shared with us last year.
I wish that you'd continue uploading more clips in 2013, particularly of Vaniity, Mia Isabella and Laurie Vargas.
On behalf of all admirerers, My best wishes that you enjoy a very warm, healthy and prosporous 2013.

Thanks again for your contribution to this community!
Sincerely,
Ekarth
Plus1 rep
